pages.text: The $(item)Sigil of the Fast Miner$() is a Sigil that, when activated using [$(k:sneak)] and [$(k:use)], will consume $(blood)100 LP$() every 10 seconds and apply the Haste potion effect. Thus, it increases your mining, digging, and cutting speeds. Crafted using the $(item)Mining Reagent$() and $(item)Reinforced Slate$() in an alchemy array.
